description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 11/06/2006

Donna tells Ridge that she saw Stephanie push Jackie over the banister. Later, Donna tells Storm what she saw and learns that Stephanie could go to prison for aggravated assault. Nick is furious and confronts Stephanie about Jackie’s fall. Stephanie grabs a gun and points it at Nick. Eric, Ridge, and Brooke intervene. Eric takes the gun and Brooke convinces Nick to leave.  Stephanie calls Donna and accuses the entire Logan family of using her to climb the social ladder and insists the fall was Jackie’s fault. Unbeknownst to Stephanie, Donna has her phone of speaker so Storm, Nick, and Brooke can hear as well. Nick states that he wants to get even and Storm suggests filing a civil case against Stephanie.
